getUpurchasesByList.sql: SELECT * FROM Items WHERE listId = $listId AND purchased = 0
getUpurchasesByList.description: Retrieves the items belonging to the specified list that haven't been purchased yet.

getPurchasedByList.sql: SELECT * FROM Items WHERE listId = $listId AND purchased = 1
getPurchasedByList.description: Retrieves the items belonging to the specified list that have been purchased

upQuantity.sql: UPDATE Items SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE itemId = $itemId

downQuantity.sql: UPDATE Items SET quantity = quantity - 1 WHERE itemId = $itemId
downQuantity.description: decreases the quantity of items in the shopping cart.

purchase.sql: UPDATE Items SET purchased = 1 WHERE itemId = $itemId
purchase.description: purchases an item by its corresponding id.
